Today, the battle is moving from one of mobile devices to one of mobile ecosystems, and our strengths here are complementary. Ecosystems thrive when they reach scale, when they are fueled by energy and innovation and when they provide benefits and value to each person or company who participates, Stephen Elop and Steve Ballmer added.`` This is what we are creating; this is our vision; this is the work we are driving from this day forward.'' strtegic memo that was leaked in advance of

Mike Pence Steve Cohen , D-Tennessee, used a late night House floor speech Tuesday to hit Republicans for what he called`` lies'' about a government takeover of the health care system, and evoked Nazi propagandist Joseph Goebbels. They say it's a government takeover of health care, a big lie, just like Goebbels. You say it enough, you repeat the lie, you repeat the lie, you repeat the lie and eventually people believe it, he said. Steve Cohen , who is Jewish, went on to compare that`` lie'' to the term`` blood libel,'' a phrase that historically was used to falsely accuse Jews of killing Christian children.

Jazz 120-109 on Thursday night.`` I've now scored 40 points on the highest stage you can ever score,'' said Linas Kleiza , whose previous career-high of 29 came March 15 against the Los Angel Robinsones Lakers. It was definitely a special night, Linas Kleiza said.`` I will remember this night for the rest of my life.'' The Nuggets have been searching for a consistent third scorer behind Carmelo Anthony and Allen Iverson , and Linas Kleiza filled the role Thursday. He

want the Bill Clinton and Congress to work together on the big issues, not least the economy. Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better.
